nodes.text: Rydel Delan was a male Sayormi who was on Tansarii Point Station for a period of time, worked out of the combat training room as the combat master on Tansarii where he hired a spacer to deal with a number of problems on the station during the Galactic Civil War in 1 ABY. This included thinning down the increasing number of wild creatures in the station's atrium, helping the local cantina owner, Tiarsis, with a bully and preventing a saboteur from damaging the station. Finally he asked the spacer to help stop the invasion of the lower levels by the gang known as the Genesis Red by killing a large number of their thugs and their leader, Genesis Red.

Delan owned several old pieces of fighter equipment including a tarnished brawling champion's ring, a frayed pit fighter's belt and a warp Brawler's bracelet one of which he gave to the spacer in thanks for his help. He also carried a sword, an axe and a Knuckler as his own weapons however for killing Genesis Red he gave one to the spacer to show his gratitude. One of Rydel's swords was left behind at a Downed Blood Razor's Transport on Lok, only to later be retrieved by a spacer exploring the area.

Rydel Delan was first introduced as a NPC on the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. He was a non-hostile character found in the tutorial level on Tansarii point station which was added by the NGE update. He gave the player several optional side quests of varying levels of difficulty.
